title: Friend had their account comprimised and transfered to EUNE
body:
So about 3 hours ago, a friend of mine had told me they received an email that their account name was changed, after exploring into the issue we had found their password was changed and when attempting to log into NA after resetting the password successfully, it told them that their account was in the process of being transferred, we tracked the name down to an EUNE account which after an hour had had a single game played on it and was LVL 30 with the exact same icon that my friend used.

they has submitted report tickets and request recovery help through the support website, but when submitting the recovery help they have not gotten a verification that their request was received.  We want to make sure that this can be dealt with and have the account returned to its original owner on its original server with its original name, and we don't want to give the person responsible enough time to do any more damage to the account.

replies.body:
Don't worry, we can help!  Your friend submitting a ticket was a great plan, as our account team can help towards recovery.  If he doesn't have access to the account, then he might have problems accessing the ticketing site.  Instead, have him fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which doesn't require a login, and will instead go to the email he submits in the form.

Your friend should go over our [account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide in the meantime to make sure his info is secure.  Thanks for looking out for him!

She already submitted the account recovery form, but it did not send a receipt of request to her email address.  That is what we are worried about right now.

Riot Support Twitter guided us to the recovery form and said we should wait till Monday for a response.  She is just very worried about the account as it was transferred to EUNE and the name was changed.

Thank you for the response.

Good Morning, I just wanted to update you on the status.  My friend has just received automated ticket responses to her email about tickets being submitted by the thief.

Update 2: She has now gotten a direct email from who we believe is the thief.

Hey don't worry, our account team won't restore access unless they're absolutely sure it's being restored to the owner.  What the ticket number?  I appreciate you wanting to look at, but our team will only correspond with the account owner.  The ticket will be in good hands!

We now have over 9 emails from the person who stole the account (in the last 3 hours), including messages of them admitting to taking the account.  They are persistently sending emails to my friend.  She is extremely distressed at the lack of response from riot, i am trying my best to help on this side, but we just want some progress if we can.
